source.intro_description: This is our Debian APT repository for storing and distributing custom packages, including custom Linux kernel builds and firmware for various target devices.
source.addAptRepo_title: Adding this repository to your system
source.addAptRepo_description1: To add this repo to APT so that you can install its packages, run the following commands:
source.addAptRepo_description2: You should then be able to apt install any packages in this repo. Try installing liveg-hello and running liveg-hello to see if the LiveG APT Repository has been added correctly.
source.searchForPackage_inputPlaceholder: Enter the name of a package to search for
